title: Complete error from server to client
description:
Encapsulates a device-to-client message sent via the signaling server.
This flavour of the signaling message defines the format that the server uses when forwarding a message sent from the device to the client.
Consequently it defines the format that a client must understand when receiving.

type.description: Specifies this message as a signaling message.

targetId.description: The target id from which the message is sent.

orgId.description: The id of the organization that the device belongs to.

P2P.title: Error Message
P2P.description: Represents an error event sent asynchronously from the device.

apiVersion.description: The API version used by the error event sender.

type.description: Specifies that this message is an event (neither request or response)

sessionId.description: An identifier chosen by the client on session initialization.

error.description: The presence of an error object indicates a failed validation

code.description: A numeric error code intended for machine interpretation.

message.description: A descriptive error message intended for human interpretation.

examples: Media streaming failure for audio track from client to device
details.description: Optional extra information about the error
